website_summaries.verdict: This griddle adjusts from flat to tilted to allow meats to drain better into the drip tray.
pros: Adjusts from level cooking surface for eggs and pancakes to tilted surface that helps meats drain
Legs fold in and drip tray locks in place
cons: Adjustable, folding legs are not as stable as fixed ones
Watch the drain carefully to keep it and the drip tray from spilling

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cook evenly
customer_reviews.text: Just like all the other non-stick griddles I've tried this one doesn't cook evenly. The part of the cooking surface running over the heating element gets really hot while the rest of the surface must be 30 or 40 degree cooler. The result is part of each pancake was almost burnt while the other part was barely cooked. Going back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: MmcKaibab

customer_reviews.title: Very Uneven Heating
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend this. The temperature setting is hard to see when I use (which I should have noticed from the product pictures), but the biggest issue is the unevenness of the heat. I’ve used it several times, and some sections will almost burn the food while other spots have hardly any heat.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C.

customer_reviews.title: Grill  Fails
customer_reviews.text: This grill was good the first couple of weeks then it started falling apart. The container that holds the liquid that drained from the grill has broken, it doesn't get as hot as it did in the beginning. Only got a 30 day return policy, of course, went over return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Adele J. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Typical Presto product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for our 15 yo Presto that broke after its 3rd trip to the floor. The only complaint with this is that the regulator is in the rear, making it difficult to see. The tilt-n-fold is great for storing compared to our last one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and flimsy.  Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Product felt very cheaply made, and flimsy. Would not sit level on any surface in my kitchen including the glass cooktop. Warped. Return for exchange. Update. Replacement unit finally arrived. This time, it would sit level with legs deployed, but not with extensions and not with legs flat. Also noteworthy is the spring clip that hold the leg on was not fully screwed allowing the clip to flop around. My previously purchased presto brand griddle lasted my wife and me 23 years until we dropped it and snapped one of the legs. Having been so pleased with the prior purchase, I sought out this brand for a replacement. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: alex henson

customer_reviews.title: Love the larger surface area
customer_reviews.text: I've used the griddle several times and love the larger size to cook mutible things at a time. folding legs are helpful for storage also. seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Wish Harpy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I live the product! The tilt legs are hard to pop out but other then that it great. It's a large griddle. So when we make pancakes and sausage links they all fit on one. Less dishes!!!
customer_reviews.author: stacey burkett

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Griddle is easy to use and very easy to clean Making a large batch of pancakes is assurance that we all eat at the same time. I am able to make 6 grilled cheese sandwiches at one time, and this alone is worth the price of the griddle. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Meets all expectations. This is our second one. We wore out the first after several years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uneven heat and cooking with extremely short cord
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I love the size of this griddle. It does fold up nicely to store easier. Cons: The middle barely heats up so you can only really cook around the sides. This is really bad for making pancakes. Which is why I bought this product. Leaves one heat stripe on my pancakes and does not cook evenly at all. One side of my pancake is cooked and the other side of the pancake is still pale and raw. Very disappointed with this product. The cord is extremely short. I have to move things on my counter to use because the cord is short. Wish I hadn't given away my old one for this new griddle. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Kimi J

customer_reviews.title: Great Electric Griddle
customer_reviews.text: HUGE and awesome. **SLAPS GRIDDLE** You can fit 9 pancakes on this bad boy
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Cooks beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Presto product! It cooks beautifully and fast. This is our favorite devise to cook especially in the summer were we can cook outside. When we go camping in our Airstream trailer this is the 1st thing we pack. We have owned much more expensive griddles but the Presto seems to be my favorite so far. It is light weight and is big enough to cook for a family of 6. It's also super easy to clean! The value of this product is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: America's Test Kitchen reviews do not disappoint (check their reviews on kitchen stuff stuff). Got this for my wife's Christmas present (she requested it, but still), and it heats up pretty evenly and quickly, cooks great, and is hot just like the cook who's using it. Most importantly, the legs fold in to make it easier to store, and with limited space in our kitchen, that's is a big Plus!
customer_reviews.author: SuperRob2004

customer_reviews.title: Nice large surface, but slow to heat and awkward to store
customer_reviews.text: This works well, but is rarely used because in the time it takes to heat up I can easily cook a similar qty of pancakes on the stove. It is also BIG and awkward to store--while the feet fold, the result is still an unwieldy, reasonably thick rectangle plus the heater plug-in part plus the grease catcher. It would be slightly less annoying if the heater part could stay plugged in when you fold it, or had a place you could store it and/or the grease catcher inside the legs or something when in storage.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Folk

customer_reviews.title: BUY ONE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE This griddle. I make pancakes and breakfast for my family. This griddle is amazing and we absolutely love it! My BBQ is not working currently but i cooked burgers on this griddle and it worked fantastically. I had 8 1/4 patties on this griddle with plenty of room to spare, It could have easily fit 12 full size burgers. The drip tray is large but when cooking 8+ burgers at the same time, you will need to dump it at least once.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy johns

customer_reviews.title: Large area
customer_reviews.text: The large area makes making pancakes quick and easy. It Can handle about 9 five inch pancakes at a time. The center area sometimes isn't as hot as the two ends, but that may be due to me in a hurry to eat my pancakes. I have only used it for pancakes but it is designed for other foods as well. It folds up and stores very easily on its side.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best griddle ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Presto griddles for more than 25 years. This griddle is by far the best. Love the tilt to drain excess fat from bacon, etc. Folding legs help with storage and extra large drip pan captures grease fr yhi om 2 lbs of back. I totally recommend this griddle ... did I forget to mention it comes in 3 sizes?
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Little on the cheap side
customer_reviews.text: Design is nice for storage. Time will tell if it holds up. The folding legs feel a little flimsy. When the tilt legs are used the grease tray can easily slide out. Otherwise I like it and use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Trent oki

customer_reviews.title: Best I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this griddle for some time now, I use it at least twice a week. Cook evenly everything from eggs, burgers, sandwiches. Easy clean up, and storage. My opinion is the drip pan could be larger, I just have to watch what I cook. other than that this is by far the best griddle I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love this griddle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this griddle so much more than my old one. It's non stick, the tilt feature is nice and it is a nice size. Overall does exactly what I want it to. Around the edges the heat distribution is a bit sketchy, but not enough that it affects my thoughts on the product in general.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!! Even cooking, fast heating
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic addition. I went with this product based on the SeriousEats recommendation and love it. Best pancakes I’ve made we’re on the first try with this griddle. Fast heating, precise temperature control, large surface, and easy to clean. It also folds up to store really slim.
customer_reviews.author: John Flemming

customer_reviews.title: 5 months.... so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: There are some hotter spots on the grill when cooking. It's still a good grill. Cooked cheese, eggs, steak, bacon etc.. and I can wipe the grill clean with a paper towel. Truly nonstick. Large enough for a family of 6. Nice tilt feature, to drain grease.
customer_reviews.author: P. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Love  the skillet broken tray
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product my only complaint is that my Catch tray was a little chipped on the edge she doesn’t fully go in properly
customer_reviews.author: stephnie22

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for hubby!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great griddle!! Got it for my husband on Father’s Day since he loves making bacon and grilling out. He has made so much stuff on the griddle and enjoys using his little “toy”! He said the edges don’t see lm to cook as good, but that happens with any sort of cooking. Easy clean up, LOVE the tilt feature to get the grease running off, and lightweight and easy to use. One happy customer!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmom11

customer_reviews.title: Good!  Beware of pinch points.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent. Works well. Some hot spots for sure but that’s to be expected. The major flaw in this design is the huge pinch points. Whenever you fold the legs out, if you’re hand is in the right spot, it is extremely painful.
customer_reviews.author: DaBlakesta

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle
customer_reviews.text: Great size, lots of room for pancakes and super easy to clean when batter drips down the side. Good heat distribution but could be better, though it has improved since our last Presto griddle that was ancient. I would recommend this, and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Arin H

customer_reviews.title: great big electric grill
customer_reviews.text: I use this grill outside when I don't feel like firing up the grill. Works great. It's a little big which is great when you are cooking lots of things on it at once. but that little grease catcher is such a pain. it is constantly falling out because there is nothing to hold it in place. so when you go to store it and are handing it back to store it, the grease trap falls out many, many times!!! ugh!!!!! There should be a way to lock it in place!
customer_reviews.author: krystyna szot

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good just the heat distribution is not even ... especially in the center, the coil is not there, they should add it I make dosa on it and for parties its good size to heat rotis and pav...
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: One star short.
customer_reviews.text: Another heating coil would rate 5 stars. Alas. all griddles are done with one u shaped coil leaving a slight temperature variation. A y shaped coil would do a better job of heat distribution.
customer_reviews.author: .Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room.
customer_reviews.text: I like this griddle mostly because it has a lot of surface area but doesn't take up a lot of room. I like the way the legs fold in for storage also.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Nice griddle!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. The ONLY thing I would complain about is the grease catch...it may sound petty but I wish it would “click” into place so when I’m carrying it to put it away it doesn’t fall out. Other than that, it’s great!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Excellent griddle, great value
customer_reviews.text: Simply stated, this griddle is great for quick meals, great price, and easy to clean. The tilt capability is great for drainage, eg., bacon fat.
customer_reviews.author: A. A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: gave it to my son who love's to make pancakes for his 3 kids. better than using a heavy stove top griddle. he can make enough at one time to keep the kids happy. great for bacon and eggs and sausages, everything!
customer_reviews.author: cooking cat lady

customer_reviews.title: Glass cannon!
customer_reviews.text: Used this griddle to cook 10 double sliders for my kids December 27th birthday. Used it once. Cooked so well I was thrilled! The frame that holds the retractable legs, that tilt the griddle tilting for fat drainage, broke. Loved it for a day, but I hope to get more than one use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: jASON

customer_reviews.title: Great design poorly executed.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Drip tray will not stay in place when you tip the table as designed. It won't even stay in place to carry it to a storage area. Should have sent this back.
customer_reviews.author: Zipdrive20

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our old Presto and we love this one so far. Love the larger cook surface when using for our family of 7.
customer_reviews.author: CountryGuy

customer_reviews.title: Super versatile, very useful
customer_reviews.text: This can be used to cook many different things. So far, I've used it to make bacon, cook sandwiches, and burgers. The tilt feature is awesome. I also like how easy it is to clean up. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsarella

customer_reviews.title: Large griddle  space and foldable legs
customer_reviews.text: Love the extra large griddle space. Easy to clean and love the legs folding in. Makes it great for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Corkath

customer_reviews.title: Really Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: Best product for cooking and zero issues. Does have minor scratches from metal spatula.
customer_reviews.author: William Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Best griddle yet
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this griddle. She said it’s the best griddle she’s used
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: good size
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded to this larger size. Now the entire package of bacon fits :-)
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: So close to perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice upgrade from our prior griddle but I can’t figure out why, with the clever way it folds up and locks the drip tray in for storage, why not make the drip tray large enough to store the temperature controller inside? Why not print the sticker on the temperature dial so that it’s right side when you use this model?
customer_reviews.author: SP1

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and with the fold down handles easy to store when not using
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Just what my husband wanted for pancake breakfasts!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is very reliable. Easy to make multiple pancakes at once and they are all perfect. Also easy to make other things on it - eggs etc. good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Claire A Meehl

customer_reviews.title: The Big Easy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughters family, she's used it for about a week with 3 kids she says 2 thumbs up. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Schack

customer_reviews.title: Handy and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: When you have limited storage this is great. Folds flat
customer_reviews.author: readsalot

customer_reviews.title: Not bad dose the job
customer_reviews.text: Work good but doesn't heat up even all the way across
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Cooked!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love!!! It cuts my pancake production in half. The middle has slightly less heat distribution, but overall it doesn't change my opinion that this is a great value and hugely useful.
customer_reviews.author: Lifter/Runner

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months of using this, it's my favorite kitchen tool. It's light, relatively cheap, and works amazing. Grilled cheese, pancakes, eggs all cook without sticking and cook evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Liked that it was big and it titled for grease
customer_reviews.author: Frog

customer_reviews.title: Electric  Griddle.
customer_reviews.text: I like it easy to cook on. Easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: GOOFY

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift ! My husband is throughly enjoying this gift. Perfect heating, perfect pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: Skull Diva

customer_reviews.title: Stores Easily
customer_reviews.text: This is great to cook on and it folds to store like a cookie sheet. I am really happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: DMidd

customer_reviews.title: works wonderfully for a family of 12!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have nine children, myself, my husband and my mother living in our home right now. We needed a bigger griddle for the frequent meals of pancakes or grilled cheese sandwiches. This works great!
customer_reviews.author: happygolightly

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: We have had many griddles and this is by far the best. We love that the control knob is on the back. It keeps it away from the wall and wires from getting frayed. We like that it folds up for putting away while not in use. The drop pan is kind of small.
customer_reviews.author: Yorley Gutierrez Godinez

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It makes cooking for a large family so much faster! I love how easy it is to clean. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean and storage.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Presto. Loved the first one and this one is better. Easy clean and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Sims

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The only things that fold in are the legs. It’s still very bulky and large. Very nice surface though. Heats very evenly
customer_reviews.author: Dannielle Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to clean. Use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: tareview

customer_reviews.title: America's Test Kitchen WINNER!
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this because ATK named it as the BEST griddle on the market. They tested them all, so I trust their opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa C.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the money. Cooking bacon there’s a distinct area of the cooking surface that doesn’t heat as hot as other areas. Overall it’s a good price for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. Even though I don’t thing it ever gets up to 450 degrees. I use it as a food warmer and as a griddle to make pancakes. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Large cooking space, even cooking
customer_reviews.text: Even cooking, heats fast. Large so takes up space on counter but folds up and fits in drawer below oven.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sadis

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This grill cooks a variety of foods evenly. The non stick coating is excellent making clean up a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Overall - very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Griddle works really well and heats up quickly. Heats evenly and is easy to clean. I really like the folding legs - stores in a thin cabinet in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice skillet
customer_reviews.text: The electric skillet works great, just wish it had a warming tray below the cooking surface
customer_reviews.author: David Dezern

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We love this Griddle!! It is very easy to clean, and we love that you can tilt/ fold the sides to make it fit in the cupboard better! We would definitely recommend to anyone looking for an easy to use griddle. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Durability?
customer_reviews.text: The dimensions are correct for me. The tilt and folding legs work perfectly. Cleaning it is simple. I was expressed with the heat distribution on the cooking surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Saves tine with quick heat up and no stick.
customer_reviews.author: B.E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit
customer_reviews.text: Worked nicely. Large enough to do 8 eggs easily at the same time. Quality seems pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Tripper61

customer_reviews.title: Uneven Heat Distribution
customer_reviews.text: Heat distribution is very uneven, with significant difference in hot and cool spots.
customer_reviews.author: AX

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Used it 3 times for pancakes, works great. Dont need any spray, and its recommended not to use spray. Must turn up heat slowly. Easy to clean and store. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Whole family breakfast
customer_reviews.text: Easy for even my kids to make their pancakes . We get a scrambled eggs done on the other side.whole family’s breakfast done.
customer_reviews.author: Jag Geethafe

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast!
customer_reviews.text: Love this griddle. Easy to clean and store. Large surface for bacon, pancakes, and eggs!
customer_reviews.author: Mick Constantino

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect excepts the cheap plastic legs broke after a week of use!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I love how thin it is!! It’s so easy to clean too! Makes THE perfect pancakes!
customer_reviews.author: barney

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Nonstick, plenty of space and easy to clean. Definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for bacon & pancakes... it’s nice to have the tilt feature especially when cooking bacon.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Good electric griddle. I like that it folds down on the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Like the extra large surface.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, plenty room for several items at the same time. When it’s in the full tilt position, the drip tray falls out. The drip tray i# not very well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Zeb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to make Dosa and breakfast!
customer_reviews.text: It’s lightweight , easy to store and perfect for making Indian crepes “dosa”
customer_reviews.author: Pranalika

customer_reviews.title: Nice griddle!
customer_reviews.text: Great griddle, use it to cook pancakes and sausage weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Julius Oboma

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good grill but the grease tray comes out easily. Mine fell out and broke.
customer_reviews.author: David Navarro

customer_reviews.title: the cook top it good and holding up
customer_reviews.text: Three stars at the moment, as so far, the cook top it good and holding up. However, the legs and frame is weak. The bakelite, or whatever the frame/legs are made of, has chipped off in two parts. Two bits of it have flown off, across the kitchen floor, when trying to fold it away. It is now a little ricketty and I'm worried that more will break off and the f-ing thing will not stand up anymore. We'll see. I do enjoy cooking breakfast on it tho
customer_reviews.author: Ewen F.

customer_reviews.title: Presto griddle
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Nothing sticks to it and I love the tilt on it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Legs are not as stable as I would like them to be. Does heat evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend to buy this item to anyone
customer_reviews.text: The stand is not stable. It heats up so slow. I would not recommend to buy this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eve Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Been happy so far.
customer_reviews.text: I like how many things I can cook on this. The cord is a bit too short as my plug is on the opposite side and over the edge of my island so I have to turn it in a awkward position but otherwise I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reiniche

customer_reviews.title: And a Griddling we will go!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this griddle. It's the perfect size to cook a full assortment of breakfast or dinner items at the same time. Heats up quickly and the heat is very evenly distributed. The only downside I have experienced so far is the controller is off with the temp settings. If I set it on 350 degrees the griddle heats up to well over 400. I have an infrared thermometer to check temps. Not really a big deal as long as you remember to set it a bit lower. All in all I am very pleased with my purchase and will recommend to all families who like to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Klind1970

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle, larger surface than expected!! Perfect for large family.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this griddle! Huge surface, easily fits 9 to 12 pieces of bread at one time. Has a tilt feature to allow grease to drain into the grease drawer under the front rim of the cooking surface while cooking. Cleans perfectly with just sudsy hot water and a gentle sponge. Slight heat spot at back left side that subtly cooks a bit more which was only noticeable with pancakes. My only complaint is where the temperature control is located, it is very difficult to see since it is located below the cooking surface at the back of the griddle which is completely out of view.
customer_reviews.author: J. Elling

customer_reviews.title: Close to great,  but dropped the ball with the heat distribution
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted to love this griddle. The size is wonderful. The folding legs, genius. Easy to clean and store! But, and it is a big but, the heat distribution it terrible. Maybe I just expect to much from a griddle.... or maybe I am a pancake snob (I am kinda). When I am making pancakes, or French toast, I do not want to see a dark line down the middle. Or have half of it dark and the other half pasty white. I guess my search continues for a griddle that has more than a circle heating element. If anyone knows of one let me know!
customer_reviews.author: Tmwid

customer_reviews.title: Light, compact, easy to use. The tilt is amazing. best grill ever
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God oh my God oh my God is all I can say this is the best Crystal I've ever owned in my life I absolutely love this thing so easy to clean so easy that use there's nothing bad about this thing I cleaned it up as soon as I got it out of the box Washed it real good and then made some French toast bacon and hash browns perfect heat distribution and I love the tilt and it fold in right up cool things can go in the water you don't have to worry about it. It is so light as well
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, large size grill
customer_reviews.text: The size and the convenience of folding legs makes this a very workable grill. Cleans up easily and stores in my vertical baking sheet cabinet nicely. As others have noted, the grill has some hot and cool spots but I think that is the nature of this type grill. I simply move my items around and they cook up quite nicely. Look forward to many years service. Oh, and the grill surface is much nicer than the old dark brown teflon models.
customer_reviews.author: TLD from Texas

customer_reviews.title: It's AWESOME! Game changer.
customer_reviews.text: This griddle is a game changer for us and we use it so often. It works so well!!! It heats up fast and cooks fairly even. I can fit 10 grilled cheese on it if necessary! We have cooked: pancakes, grilled cheese, chicken breasts, hamburgers, fried potatoes, quesadillas, eggs etc. IT is AMAZING! The legs fold under it for a flatter storage and I love the ability of the tilting legs with fat catcher. We spray it down with a water bottle while it is still hot and wipe clean, unless we cook meat. Love love love. I just wish i had found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: MrsHDye07

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - Uneven heat
customer_reviews.text: One side is hotter than the other, the middle is cold and it is difficult to control the heat. It is pretty. We like the folding legs but in the end it is a griddled and it should provide even heat distribution for cooking, plain and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Forred

customer_reviews.title: A great griddle
customer_reviews.text: I love this griddle. It is large and has evenly distributed heat. The only problem I have identified is the oil receptacle is loose. it kept falling out until it was adjusted by bending the metal part of the frame where it entered the bottom of the griddle. The legs fold under the griddle for storage and it is simple to wash and the nonstick surface comes clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Love this Griddle
customer_reviews.text: Love the griddle's tilt leg feature ... helps eliminate grease. Love that you can leave it flat for cooking eggs or grilling sandwiches. Griddle is very easy to clean. My favorite feature is the size. I can do bacon, sausage and eggs all at one time, give it a quick wipe and do pancakes. Much better than having 300 pans to clean!
customer_reviews.author: WyckedStepmom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Store, Clean, and Use
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an older griddle, and I'm very pleased with it. I store it standing on end, covered by a plastic bag, along side my cutting boards. It can be used flat or tilted (great for draining bacon grease). It's "fully submersible," which makes it easy to wash in the sink. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Love this griddle
customer_reviews.text: Love this griddle hate that the grease tray falls out easily if u don’t bend the legs in. It’s just a matter of time and it’s going to get broken I’ve lifted the griddle to move it before in the tree falls out and hits the floor just a matter of time my only complaint other than that it’s pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Reva

customer_reviews.title: Heats evenly and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this griddle, but it heats evenly, cleans easily, and I've cooked eggs, bacon, home fries, and eggs My only complaints: The power cord is short, maybe 3' is better The power led is blocked, maybe put it on the knob? The legs should lock
customer_reviews.author: Petey D

product_meta.title: Presto 07073 Electric Tilt-N-fold Griddle, 19", Black inch
product_meta.description: Great for every meal: breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Easily adjusts from a level cooking surface for eggs and pancakes to a tilted surface for meats. Legs fold in and drip tray locks in place for easy, compact storage. Heavy cast aluminum base with large 254-square-inch cooking surface. Premium nonstick surface ensures stick-free cooking and easy cleaning. Control Master heat control automatically maintains the desired cooking temperature. Slide-out drip tray empties easily. Easy to clean. Fully immersible with the heat control removed. Tilt to drain. Flip down the levers to tilt the grilling surface when cooking meats. Fold to store. Fits in most standard 18-inch kitchen cabinets. 120 volts AC, 1200 watts.

Legs fold in and drip tray locks in place for easy, compact storage. Heavy cast aluminum base with large 254-square-inch cooking surface
